question:
Rana Kumbha patronized which of the following great scholars?
1) Mahesh
2) Atri
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Rana Kumbha who ruled Mewar from 1433 CE to 1468 CE was a great patron of art and literature and a great musician himself. He also patronized great scholars such as Mahesh and Atri, the composers of the inscriptions of Victory Tower.
